definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: The London to Edinburgh express steamed into Newcastle fight on time.
sentences.chinese: 从伦敦到爱丁堡的快车准时驶抵纽卡斯尔。

sentences.english: Obafemi Martins is reportedly keen to quit Newcastle United Football Club.
sentences.chinese: 报道称，马丁斯准备离开纽卡斯尔。

sentences.english: The Chelsea boss is also wary of the Toon Army effect.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西教练很警惕纽卡斯尔军团的影响。

sentences.english: Did that outburst really effect Keegan's Newcastle team?
sentences.chinese: 那次大爆发真的影响到了基冈的纽卡斯尔？

sentences.english: It crosses the River Tyne, connecting Gateshead and New Castle.
sentences.chinese: 千禧桥横跨泰恩河，连接着盖茨黑德和纽卡斯尔。

sentences.english: He spent most of his time in the fishing village of Cullercoats, near New Castle.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的时间他都待在纽卡斯尔附近的一个渔村里。

sentences.english: A filed copy of this certificate has been forwarded to the new castle county recorder of deeds.
sentences.chinese: 此证明书的存档件已转发给纽卡斯尔县契约记录员。

sentences.english: Sol Campbell has hinted at a move to Sunderland and not Newcastle. (Sun)
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔暗示将转会桑德兰，而非纽卡斯尔。

sentences.english: He is at Parma now and he has a chance to shine.
sentences.chinese: 他现在在纽卡斯尔，现在有机会大放光彩。

sentences.english: The ticket-inspector asked me whether I'd got ore at Edinburgh or Newcastle.
sentences.chinese: 检票员问我是从爱丁堡还是从纽卡斯尔上的车。

sentences.english: That is what researchers at Newcastle University recently set out to discover.
sentences.chinese: 这就是纽卡斯尔大学的研究员最近的初步发现。

sentences.english: Well, at least we know he isn't hiding in Newcastle.
sentences.chinese: 那个，至少我们可以知道他没藏在纽卡斯尔。

sentences.english: The main shopping street in the city is Northumberland Street.
sentences.chinese: 纽卡斯尔主要的购物街是诺森伯兰大街。

definition: Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
Lester or Leicester (name)/Leicester, English city in East Midlands
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
